source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_SEQ_00<tab>Rahu is staring intently into the distance for signs of movement.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_SEQ_00<tab>ワイトロック北の断崖のラフは、真剣な眼差しで崖下を監視している。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Ala Ghiri hunter.
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_TODO_02<tab>Use the bottle of muud suud tallow on Rahu.
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_000<tab>Mind your step. This headwind is helping us now, but the wind can be fickle. You don't want the Qiqirn picking up your scent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_000おっと、お前さん……あんまり前に出すぎるな。
キキルン族は、鼻が利く。
今は向かい風だから多少は構わんが、風は気まぐれだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_001<tab>I've been posted here to monitor their movement, but I fear they may discover me soon as my, uh...<var 1A 02 /var>perfume<var 1A 01 /var> has nearly run out.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_001俺の任務は、ここに張り込んで、
キキルン族の山賊の動向を監視すること。
……なんだが、大切な臭い消しを切らしちまってな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_002<tab>Wait a minute. You're an adventurer, right? I've got a job for you, if you're interested in making a bit of easy gil.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_002そうか、お前さんが冒険者なら、仕事を依頼すればいいのか。
簡単な使いだし、もちろん報酬を支払う用意もあるぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_003<tab>I need you track down an acquaintance of mine─a hunter from Ala Ghiri─and fetch a flask of muud suud tallow from him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_003近くで狩りをしてる「アラギリの狩人」から、
「」をもらってきて欲しいんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_004<tab>The Qiqirn have been unusually active the past few days, and I dare not take my eyes off them if I can help it. Bring me that flask, and consider yourself a few gil wealthier.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_004最近、奴らの活動が目に見えて活発になってきたから、
俺はここで、監視を続けなけりゃならない。
だから頼むよ、冒険者さん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_005<tab>He was likely heading this way, so he shouldn't be far from here. Don't take too long with that flask, now. I can't have the Qiqirn catching my scent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_005近くで狩りをしてる「アラギリの狩人」から、
「」をもらってきて欲しいんだ。
頼むよ、冒険者さん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_010<tab>Rahu sent you, did he? The Qiqirn must be up to something big if he can't be bothered to come meet me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_010お前……ラフからの使いか。
キキルン族がなにやら怪しい動きをしていると聞いたが、
ここまで来る暇もないようだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_011<tab>Luckily for him, I've already prepared another bottle of his <var 1A 02 /var>perfume<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_011そろそろ切れる頃だと思って、
「」は用意してある。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_012<tab>Now listen: you must not, under any circumstances, open that bottle. One drop of that gets on your clothes, and you'll be smelling of chocobo shite for at least a week.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_012注意しておくが、袋は開けるなよ。
下手に触ると、一週間は臭いがとれんからな。
では、頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_013<tab>If you value your sense of smell, and perhaps your sanity, you'll be careful with that bottle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_HUNTER02846_000_013「」を、
早く「ラフ」に届けてやってくれ。
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_020<tab>無事に、取ってきてくれたようだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_021<tab>Seeing as you're here, I've got one last favor to ask of you. Would you... <gulp> Would you sprinkle that there tallow on me? Just thinking about the smell, I...I can't bear to do it myself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_021ついでですまんが、そいつを俺にぶっかけてくれないか？
臭いを思い出すと、どうしても自分でやる気にならねえんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_022<tab>Please, do it quick and be done with it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_022ついでですまんが、そいつを俺にぶっかけてくれないか？
臭いを思い出すと、どうしても自分でやる気にならねえんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_030<tab>Ugh, oh gods, my nose! I swear this smells worse than before.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_030うへぇ……この瞬間だけは、監視なんかやめて、
奴らの長い鼻を、へし折ってやりたくなるぜ。
だいたい、臭い消しって名前がおかしいだろ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_031<tab>You see, the only way to hide one's scent from the Qiqirn is to─<cough> <cough>─is to mask it with another. Considering their keen sense of smell, even facing in this general direction must be painful for them. Then again, they don't have to live with it...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_031消してんじゃなくて、もっと臭いもんで隠してるだけでよ。
あの長鼻野郎のせいで、俺の短い鼻が曲がっちまいそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_032<tab>You, uh... You may want to get going soon. Stay close for too long and you may have to live with this for a while yourself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ818_02846_RAFE_000_032おっと……すまない、お前さんは何も悪くないのによ。
ともかく、ありがとよ、冒険者さん。
臭いが移っちまう前に、お前さんも離れたほうがいいぜ。
